parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered candidate's campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post refers to "Valeriu Iftime" and his team.  However, it doesn't explicitly state that Valeriu Iftime is a candidate for the parliamentary elections. The hashtags #echipeiValeriuIftime and #ValeriuIftime suggest a connection to a political entity, but without confirmation of candidacy, it's unclear if Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience within specified geographical locations in Romania.  The use of hashtags and the public nature of Facebook indicate an attempt to reach a broad audience, fulfilling the criteria of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post asks "What message do the people of Botoșani transmit to Valeriu Iftime's team for Parliament?" and "Who will the people of Botoșani elect in the Romanian Parliament to represent them?". This strongly suggests an electoral objective; the aim is to gauge public opinion and potentially influence voting behavior.  Therefore, Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post's style resembles citizen journalism, presenting a question to the public. However, the framing of the question and the targeting of specific geographical areas strongly suggest an intention beyond simple information gathering. The paid nature of the post further reinforces the suspicion of an electoral objective.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post doesn't express a personal opinion; instead, it aims to gather and potentially manipulate public opinion regarding a potential candidate and their team.  It's not a personal expression but a strategic communication piece.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1106326714453008</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, while not explicitly endorsing a specific candidate, strongly suggests an electoral objective by inquiring about public opinion towards Valeriu Iftime's team and their parliamentary aspirations. The targeted geographical areas and paid nature of the Facebook advertisement further reinforce this conclusion.  While the absence of a CMF number is a mitigating factor, the overall context and intent point towards electoral propaganda.  The post's question is designed to influence voters' perceptions and potentially sway their choices.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea Botosani</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Societatea Vocea Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 1106326714453008, care, deși nu menționează explicit un candidat, solicită opinia publică cu privire la echipa lui Valeriu Iftime și aspirațiile lor parlamentare, având un efect electoral clar prin influențarea percepției alegătorilor și potențial influențând votul.  Reclama, vizând zone geografice specifice din județul Botoșani și având un buget de sub 100 RON, conform Ad Library, a atins o audiență estimată între 7.000 și 8.000 de impresii, cu o estimare a acoperirii între 100.000 și 500.000 de persoane.  Întrebările retorice din postare, cum ar fi „Ce mesaj transmit botoșănenii #echipeiValeriuIftime pentru Parlament?” și „Pe cine vor botoșănenii în Parlamentul României pe candidații echipei #ValeriuIftime pentru a-i reprezenta?”, sunt concepute pentru a influența votul, constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt office@voceabotosani.ro și +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
